related_words.definition: The period from sunset to sunrise in each twenty-four hours.
A dark area or shape produced by a body coming between rays of light and a surface.
The soft glowing light from the sky when the sun is below the horizon, either after sunset or before sunrise.
related_words.japanese_translation: 薄明かり、夕暮れ、明け暮れ

related_words.definition: The darkest part of twilight, especially at evening.
Of the darkest color or shade; of the color of coal, ebony, or outer space.
Dark or poorly lit, especially so as to appear depressing or frightening.
The state of being unknown, inconspicuous, or unimportant.
Dark and gloomy, especially due to thick mist.
Not able to be seen through; not transparent.
Comparative darkness and coolness caused by shelter from direct sunlight.
The dark shape and outline of someone or something visible against a lighter background, especially in dim light.
